articles.description:
From BTS' Jimin 's selfies, Rihanna’s fake pic holding Pakistan’s flag,  Mia Khalifa shutting trolls, we have got you covered on the Hollywood stories that made headlines.
Keywords:
articles.content: It was a week that wasnt replete of any Hollywood news. Rihanna tweeted a CNN article about farmers protest and it led to an avalanche of reactions. From her fake pic holding Pakistans flag, to Mia K… [+3367 chars]

articles.title: Varun Dhawan pulls off a night shift, heads home in morning to be with Natasha Dalal: Going to my wife - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Varun Dhawan seems to have shot for a project all night and headed home to be with his wife Natasha Dalal on Sunday morning.
articles.content: Varun Dhawan has started working on his next and seems to be doing night shifts for the new project. The actor took to his Instagram Stories to share a glimpse of his unique shooting location for the… [+1893 chars]
